column4: Upgrading to a just released version isn't very wise. I have 12.10 besides 12.04 and I see huw many bugs it has.
I recommend reinstalling 12.04 and testing 12.10 on a separate partition.
I know it's scary, but I am pretty good at troubleshooting most things, so I try to adopt early
I have nothing against early-adopting KDE, but Unity's development cycle is a sinusoid with lots of stuff going down between stable releases.
